longDef.en: the area of a town that surrounds someone's home, or the people who live in this area
longDef.cn: 邻近地区；住宅区，街区；街坊，四邻

examples.en: There were lots of kids in my neighbourhood when I was growing up.
examples.cn: 我是在有很多孩子的街区里长大的。

examples.en: They live in a wealthy/poor/friendly neighbourhood.
examples.cn: 他们生活在富裕／贫穷／和睦的街区。

examples.en: I wouldn't like to live in the neighbourhood of (= in the area around) an airport.
examples.cn: 我不会喜欢住在机场附近。
